Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN 
 begin 
 select des , INT 
 into :control.nom_tipo, :control.INTERFAZ_CTBLE 
 from fue_nom 
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 fue = :control.tipo_t ;
 exception
 wheN NO_dATA_FOUND THEN 
 messagebox('El tipo de transaccion no existe ');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END;
 begin 
 select c_cla
 into :control.c_cla
 from FUENTE_CLASECPTE 
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 fue = :control.tipo_t ;
 exception
 wheN NO_dATA_FOUND THEN 
 NULL;
 wheN TOO_MANY_ROWS THEN 
 NULL; 
 END;
 
 
 /*IF :control.INTERFAZ_CTBLE = 'S' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CONTROL.C_CLA',REQUIRED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 
 ELSE 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CONTROL.C_CLA',REQUIRED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;*/
 if :control.tipo_t = 'MS' then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CONTROL.c_fam',REQUIRED,PROPERTY_false);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DESTINO.c_fam',REQUIRED,PROPERTY_false);
 :DESTINO.c_cos := :global.c_Cos;
 :DESTINO.ubicacion := :GLOBAL.C_UBI;
 :DESTINO.resp := :global.resp;
 :DESTINO.custodio := :GLOBAL.CUSTODIO; 
 IF :DESTINO.C_COS IS NOT NULL THEN 
begin 
 select nom 
 into :DESTINO.nom_costo
 from CCOST
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 C_COS = :DESTINO.C_COS;
exception 
 when no_data_found then
 :DESTINO.nom_costo := 'No encontrada' ;
end;
END IF;
IF :DESTINO.ubicacion IS NOT NULL THEN 
begin 
 select DES_UBI 
 into :DESTINO.nom_ubicacion
 from ubicacion_act
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 cod_ubi = :DESTINO.ubicacion;
exception 
 when no_data_found then
 :DESTINO.nom_ubicacion := 'No encontrada' ;
end;
END IF;
IF :DESTINO.resp IS NOT NULL THEN 
begin 
 select nom 
 into :DESTINO.nom_resp
 from nits
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 n_ide = :DESTINO.resp;
exception 
 when no_data_found then
 :DESTINO.nom_resp := 'No encontrada' ;
end;
END IF;

IF :DESTINO.custodio IS NOT NULL THEN 
begin 
 select nombre 
 into :DESTINO.nom_custodio 
 from custodios_act
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 n_ide = :DESTINO.custodio;
exception 
 when no_data_found then
 :DESTINO.nom_custodio := 'No encontrada' ;
end;
END IF;
 end if;
 if :control.tipo_t = 'ME' then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CONTROL.c_fam',REQUIRED,PROPERTY_false);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DESTINO.c_fam',REQUIRED,PROPERTY_false);
 :ORIGEN.c_cos := :global.c_Cos;
 :ORIGEN.ubicacion := :GLOBAL.C_UBI;
 :ORIGEN.resp := :global.resp;
 :ORIGEN.custodio := :GLOBAL.CUSTODIO; 
 IF :ORIGEN.C_COS IS NOT NULL THEN 
begin 
 select nom 
 into :ORIGEN.nom_costo
 from CCOST
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 C_COS = :ORIGEN.C_COS;
exception 
 when no_data_found then
 :ORIGEN.nom_costo := 'No encontrada' ;
end;
END IF;
IF :ORIGEN.ubicacion IS NOT NULL THEN 
begin 
 select DES_UBI 
 into :ORIGEN.nom_ubicacion
 from ubicacion_act
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 cod_ubi = :ORIGEN.ubicacion;
exception 
 when no_data_found then
 :ORIGEN.nom_ubicacion := 'No encontrada' ;
end;
END IF;
IF :ORIGEN.resp IS NOT NULL THEN 
begin 
 select nom 
 into :ORIGEN.nom_resp
 from nits
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 n_ide = :ORIGEN.resp;
exception 
 when no_data_found then
 :ORIGEN.nom_resp := 'No encontrada' ;
end;
END IF;
 IF :ORIGEN.custodio IS NOT NULL THEN 
begin 
 select nombre 
 into :ORIGEN.nom_custodio 
 from custodios_act
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 n_ide = :ORIGEN.custodio;
exception 
 when no_data_found then
 :ORIGEN.nom_custodio := 'No encontrada' ;
end;
END IF; 
 end if;
 
 /*if :control.tipo_t = 'TF' then
 :control.INTERFAZ_CTBLE :='S';
 END IF;*/ 
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: BUSCAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE buscar IS
 CURSOR DATOS IS 
 SELECT C_ACT, C_AGR, c_cos, area_trab, ubicacion, resp, custodio, codinteligente,
 nom , modelo, ESTADO, FECHA , c_fam , C_PROV
 FROM ACTIV_FI 
 WHERE c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and estado IN ( 'A' ,'R' )
 and c_act like nvl(:control.c_act,'%') 
 and c_fam like nvl(:ORIGEN.c_fam,'%')
 and c_cos like nvl(:ORIGEN.c_cos,'%') 
 and area_trab like nvl(:ORIGEN.area_trab,'%') 
 and ubicacion like nvl(:ORIGEN.ubicacion,'%') 
 and resp like nvl(:ORIGEN.resp,'%') 
 and ((:ORIGEN.custodio is not null and
 c_act in (select a.c_act from actf_custodios a
 where a.c_emp = :global.empresa
 and a.n_ide = :ORIGEN.custodio 
 and a.est = 'A' ) ) or
 :ORIGEN.custodio is null ) 
 order by 1; 
 
BEGIN
 GO_BLOCK('ACTIV_FI'); 
 clear_block(no_validate); 
 for a in datos 
 LOOP
 GO_BLOCK('ACTIV_FI');
 CREATE_RECORD; 
 :activ_fi.c_act := a.c_Act;
 :activ_fi.c_cos := a.c_cos ;
 :activ_fi.area_trab := a.area_trab ;
 :activ_fi.ubicacion := a.ubicacion ;
 :activ_fi.resp := a.resp ;
 :activ_fi.codinteligente := a.codinteligente ;
 :activ_fi.nom := a.nom ;
 :activ_fi.modelo := a.modelo ;
 :activ_fi.c_fam := a.c_fam ;
 :activ_fi.c_AGR := a.c_AGR ;
 :activ_fi.modelo := a.modelo ; 
 :activ_fi.C_PROV := a.C_PROV ; 
 :ACTIV_FI.SEL := 'S'; 
 select sum(nvl(valor,0) )
 into :activ_fi.valor_va
 from OPERACIONES_ACTIVO
 where c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and c_act = :ACTIV_FI.C_ACT 
 and fecha <= :control.fecha 
 and ESTADO = 'A'
 and tipo = 'VA';
 
 select sum(nvl(valor,0) ) 
 into :activ_fi.valor_dv
 from OPERACIONES_ACTIVO
 where c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and c_act = :ACTIV_FI.C_ACT 
 and fecha <= :control.fecha 
 and ESTADO = 'A'
 and tipo = 'DV';
 
 :activ_fi.valor_va := nvl(:activ_fi.valor_VA,0);
 :activ_fi.valor_va := nvl(:activ_fi.valor_dv,0);
 
 :activ_fi.Costo_actual := Act.Costo_Historico(:Global.Empresa,:ACTIV_FI.C_act );
 :activ_fi.Costo_actual := nvl(:activ_fi.Costo_actual,0); 
 --
 -- Procedimiento que Devuelve los Valores Actuales del Activo como
 -- Ajuste el Costo Historico, Depreciacion Acumulada y Ajuste por
 -- Inflacion a la depreciacion Acumulada. Tiene en Cuenta la Disminucion
 -- de los Valores en el Caso de Algunas Desmejoras que esten incluidas en
 -- el Activo Fijo.
 --
 BEGIN 
 SELECT DEP
 INTO :activ_fi.DEPRECIABLE 
 FROM FAMIL_AF
 WHERE C_EMP= :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_FAM = a.c_fam ;
 END; 
 
 
 Act.Valores_Activo(:GLobal.Empresa, :ACTIV_FI.C_act, 
 :activ_fi.Aju_Costoh, :activ_fi.Depre_Acum, :activ_fi.Aju_Depre);
 
 :activ_fi.costo_real := nvl(:activ_fi.Costo_actual,0) + nvl(:activ_fi.Aju_CostoH ,0)
 - (nvl(:activ_fi.Depre_Acum,0) + nvl(:activ_fi.Aju_Depre ,0) ); 
 
 datos_activos; 
 END LOOP;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: GRABAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE grabar IS
 vInt param_af.intcont%Type;
 cerr number;
 merr varchar2(1000); 
 RACTIVO periodo.act%type; 
 cta plan_cta.c_Cta%type; 
 si_ctble_o number;
 si_ctble_d number; 
 SIHACE NUMBER; 
BEGIN
 BEGIN
 CERR := 0;
 MERR := 'OK'; 
 SIHACE := 0;
 if :DESTINO.c_cos is not null and
 :DESTINO.c_fam is not null then 
 messagebox('No puede realizar esta DESTINO simultaneamente ' );
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if; 
 si_ctble_o := 0; 
 si_ctble_d := 0; 
 go_block('activ_fi');
 first_record;
 loop 
 IF :activ_fi.SEL = 'S' THEN 
 buscar_cuentas; 
 if :control.TIPO_T = 'TF' THEN 
 CREA_ACTIVO_NUEVO(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA, :activ_fi.c_act ,:DESTINO.c_fam, :activ_fi.c_act_new , :GLOBAL.USUARIO_SP6, cerr , merr ) ; 
 If CErr <> 0 Then
 messagebox(merr);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 End If; 
 END IF;
 synchronize;
 
 --messagebox(:activ_fi.c_act||' 1');
 -----------------------
 ACTF_OPERACIONES(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA, :activ_fi.c_act ,:CONTROL.TIPO_T , :CONTROL.fecha ,
 :CONTROL.des||'Activo Reemplazo '|| :activ_fi.c_act_new , :CONTROL.nro_doc , NULL , NULL, 
 :activ_fi.COSTO_ACTUAL , 
 NVL(:ORIGEN.c_cos, :activ_fi.c_cos), :DESTINO.c_cos, 
 :ORIGEN.ubicacion, :DESTINO.ubicacion ,
 :ORIGEN.area_trab, :DESTINO.area_trab , 
 :ORIGEN.resp, :DESTINO.resp ,
 :ORIGEN.custodio, :DESTINO.custodio ,
 NVL(:ORIGEN.c_fam,:activ_fi.c_fam) , :DESTINO.c_fam ,
 :ORIGEN.c_cos, :ORIGEN.c_fam, 
 :control.csc, :GLOBAL.USUARIO_SP6, cerr , merr ) ; 
 If CErr <> 0 Then
 messagebox(merr);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 End If;
 
 -- messagebox(:activ_fi.c_act||' 2');
 ACTF_OPERACIONES(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA, :activ_fi.c_act , :CONTROL.TIPO_T , :CONTROL.fecha ,
 :CONTROL.des||'Activo Reemplazo '|| :activ_fi.c_act , :CONTROL.nro_doc , NULL , NULL, 
 :activ_fi.COSTO_ACTUAL , 
 NVL(:ORIGEN.c_cos, :activ_fi.c_cos), :DESTINO.c_cos, 
 :ORIGEN.ubicacion, :DESTINO.ubicacion ,
 :ORIGEN.area_trab, :DESTINO.area_trab , 
 :ORIGEN.resp, :DESTINO.resp ,
 :ORIGEN.custodio, :DESTINO.custodio ,
 NVL(:ORIGEN.c_fam,:activ_fi.c_fam) , :DESTINO.c_fam ,
 :ORIGEN.c_cos, :ORIGEN.c_fam, 
 :control.csc, :GLOBAL.USUARIO_SP6, cerr , merr ) ; 
 If CErr <> 0 Then
 messagebox(merr);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 End If;
 SYNCHRONIZE; 
 if :control.TIPO_T <> 'TF' THEN 
 -- messagebox(:activ_fi.c_act||' 3');
 ACTF_ACT_ACTIV_FI (:GLOBAL.EMPRESA, :activ_fi.c_act, :CONTROL.fecha , 
 :DESTINO.c_cos, :DESTINO.ubicacion , :DESTINO.area_trab , 
 :DESTINO.resp , :DESTINO.custodio, :control.csc, :DESTINO.c_fam, 
 :GLOBAL.USUARIO_SP6, cerr, merr);
 If CErr <> 0 Then
 messagebox(merr);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 End If; 
 end if; 
 IF :DESTINO.custodio IS NOT NULL THEN
 ACTF_ACT_CUSTODIOS (:GLOBAL.EMPRESA, :activ_fi.c_act, :control.fecha , 
 :ORIGEN.custodio, :DESTINO.custodio, 
 :GLOBAL.USUARIO_SP6, cerr, merr);
 If CErr <> 0 Then
 messagebox(merr);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 End If; 
 END IF; 
 if :activ_fi.c_cos is not null and :activ_fi.depreciable = 'S' then 
 --- VERIFICO QUE EL CENTRO DE COSTO TENGA LA FAMILIA
 CTA := ACTF_TRAE_CTA(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA, :activ_fi.C_AGR, :activ_fi.C_act, :activ_fi.c_cos, :GLOBAL.FUE_dep, 'C' );
 IF CTA IS NULL THEN
 messagebox('No tiene cuenta de depreciacion para el centro de Costo');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 END IF; 
 if :DESTINO.c_cos is not null then
 IF :activ_fi.C_cOS <> :DESTINO.c_cos THEN
 SIHACE := SIHACE + 1;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 if :DESTINO.c_fam is not null then
 IF :activ_fi.C_fam <> :DESTINO.c_fam THEN
 SIHACE := SIHACE + 1;
 END IF;
 END IF; 
 if :DESTINO.c_cos is not null and :activ_fi.depreciable = 'S' then 
 --- VERIFICO QUE EL CENTRO DE COSTO TENGA LA FAMILIA
 CTA := ACTF_TRAE_CTA(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA, :activ_fi.C_AGR, :activ_fi.C_act, :DESTINO.c_cos, :GLOBAL.FUE_dep, 'C' );
 IF CTA IS NULL THEN
 messagebox('No tiene cuenta de depreciacion para el centro de Costo');
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 END IF; 
 if :control.TIPO_T = 'MS' THEN
 UPDATE ACTIV_FI 
 SET ESTADO='R'
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_ACT = :ACTIV_FI.C_ACT; 
 END IF; 
 if :control.TIPO_T = 'ME' THEN
 UPDATE ACTIV_FI 
 SET ESTADO='A'
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_ACT = :ACTIV_FI.C_ACT; 
 END IF; 
 if :activ_fi.cta_traslado_o is not null then
 si_ctble_o := si_ctble_o + 1; 
 end if;
 if :activ_fi.cta_traslado_d is not null then
 si_ctble_d := si_ctble_d + 1;
 end if;
 
 END IF;
 go_block('activ_fi'); 
 If (:System.Last_Record = 'TRUE') Then
 Exit;
 Else
 Next_Record;
 End If;
 END LOOP; 
 if :control.c_cla is not null then
 BEGIN
 SELECT ACT
 INTO RACTIVO
 FROM PERIODO
 WHERE C_EMP =:GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND PER = TO_CHAR(:CONTROL.FECHA,'YYYYMM');
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 messagebox('El periodo '||TO_CHAR(:CONTROL.FECHA,'YYYYMM')||' no existe' );
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END; 
 end if;
 if :DESTINO.c_cos is not null then 
 if :control.c_cla is null then
 messagebox('Digite la Clase contable' );
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if;
 if ractivo = 'N' THEN
 messagebox('El periodo '||TO_CHAR(:CONTROL.FECHA,'YYYYMM')||' Esta cerrado Contablemente ' );
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF;
 IF SIHACE = 0 then
 messagebox('Se realiza el traslado sin Interfaz Contable' ); 
 else 
 ---- EN ESTA PARTE ES DONDE REVISO SI HACE INTERFAZ CONTABLE LA TA
 if si_ctble_o <> 0 or si_ctble_d <> 0 then
 INTERFAZ_CONTABLE_CCOS( :GLOBAL.EMPRESA , :CONTROL.fecha , :CONTROL.CSC , :control.c_cla,
 :control.des, :control.cpte, :global.usuario_sp6, cerr, merr);
 If CErr <> 0 Then
 messagebox(merr);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 End If;
 end if; 
 end if; 
 end if; 
 if :DESTINO.c_fam is not null then 
 if :control.c_cla is null then
 messagebox('Digite la Clase contable' );
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 end if; 
 if ractivo = 'N' THEN
 messagebox('El periodo '||TO_CHAR(:CONTROL.FECHA,'YYYYMM')||' Esta cerrado Contablemente ' );
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF; 
 IF SIHACE = 0 then
 messagebox('Se realiza el traslado sin Interfaz Contable' ); 
 else
 INTERFAZ_CONTABLE_fam( :GLOBAL.EMPRESA , :CONTROL.fecha , :CONTROL.CSC , :control.c_cla,
 :control.des, :control.cpte, :global.usuario_sp6, cerr, merr);
 If CErr <> 0 Then
 messagebox(merr);
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
 End If;
 end if; 
 end if; 
 SYNCHRONIZE;
 Commit_Form;
 
 
 IMPRIMIR; 
 Limpiar;
 end;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: IMPRIMIR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE IMPRIMIR IS
 reporte Varchar2(100);
 pl_id ParamList;
 Res number;
BEGIN
 

 
 begin
 select nvl(reporte,'act4037.rep')
 into reporte
 from fue_nom
 where c_emp=:global.usuario_sp6
 and fue='TA';
 exception
 when no_data_found then
 reporte :='act4037.rep';
 end;
 
 
 
 Res := Preguntar ('Desea imprimir Movimiento?');
 If (Res = 1) Then
 --reporte := 'Act4037_2';
 pl_id := Get_Parameter_List ('tmpdata'); 
 IF NOT Id_Null(pl_id) THEN 
 Destroy_Parameter_List( pl_id ); 
 END IF; 
 pl_id := Create_Parameter_List('tmpdata'); 
 Add_Parameter (pl_id, 'EMP', TEXT_PARAMETER, :GLOBAL.empresa);
 Add_Parameter (pl_id, 'PER', TEXT_PARAMETER, :control.PERIODO);
 Add_Parameter (pl_id, 'NUMINI', TEXT_PARAMETER, :control.CSC); 
 Add_Parameter (pl_id, 'NUMFIN', TEXT_PARAMETER, :control.CSC); 
 Run_Product (REPORTS, reporte , ASYNCHRONOUS, RUNTIME, 
 FILESYSTEM, pl_id, NULL); 
 End If;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: INICIO
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE INICIO IS 
BEGIN
 Execute_trigger('Init');
 :Control.fecha:=sysdate;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ORIGEN.C_fam',enabled,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DESTINO.C_fam',enabled,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('ORIGEN.C_COS',enabled,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DESTINO.C_COS',enabled,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 BEGIN
 SELECT N_IDE 
 INTO :control.nit_empresa 
 FROM PARAMETROS
 WHERE C_EMP=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 MessageBox('Parámetros no Están Definidos.'); 
 Exit_Form(no_validate);
 end;
 
 :GLOBAL.fue_ch := 'CH'; 
 
 --
 -- Verificamos en los Parametros si hay o no Interfaz Contable
 -- 
 Begin
 Select IntCont , Cta_Dep, Cta_AjDep, Cta_Aju, Cta_Costo, CTAC_COSTO , FUE_DEP, N_IDE,
 CCOS, C_UBI, RESP, CUST , Numera, tipo_conse 
 Into :control.contable , :control.Cta_Dep, :control.Cta_AjDep, :control.Cta_Aju,
 :control.Cta_Costo, :control.CTAC_COSTO , :GLOBAL.FUE_DEP, :GLOBAL.NIT_DEP,
 :GLOBAL.C_COS, :GLOBAL.C_UBI, :GLOBAL.RESP, :GLOBAL.CUSTODIO ,
 :Global.Numera, :Global.Tipo_csc 
 From param_Af 
 Where c_emp = :Global.empresa;
 Exception
 When no_data_found Then
 MessageBox('Parámetros De Activos Fijos No Están Definidos.'); 
 Exit_Form(no_validate);
 End;
 
 
 if :GLOBAL.fue_dep is null then
 MessageBox('No ha definido los parametros de Activos Fijos. fuente de depreacion ');
 Exit_Form(no_validate);
 end if; 
 if :GLOBAL.NIT_DEP is null then
 MessageBox('No ha definido los parametros de Activos Fijos. nit de depreacion ');
 Exit_Form(no_validate);
 end if; 
 
 begin 
 select des , INT 
 into :control.nom_tipo, :control.INTERFAZ_CTBLE 
 from fue_nom 
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 fue = :control.tipo_t ;
 exception
 wheN NO_dATA_FOUND THEN 
 messagebox('El tipo de transaccion no existe ');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END; 
 if :control.INTERFAZ_CTBLE = 'S' THEN 
 begin 
 select c_cla
 into :control.c_cla
 from FUENTE_CLASECPTE 
 where c_emp = :global.empresa and
 fue = :control.tipo_t ;
 exception
 wheN NO_dATA_FOUND THEN 
 NULL;
 wheN TOO_MANY_ROWS THEN 
 NULL; 
 END;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CONTROL.C_CLA',REQUIRED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CONTROL.C_CLA',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 IF :control.c_cla IS NOT NULL THEN
 BEGIN
 SELECT des 
 INTO :CONTROL.NOM_CLASE
 FROM CLASE_CPTE
 WHERE c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and c_cla = :control.c_cla ;
 exception
 wheN NO_dATA_FOUND THEN 
 messagebox('El clase contable no existe ');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END;
 END IF; 
 ELSE 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CONTROL.C_CLA',REQUIRED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CONTROL.C_CLA',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: LIMPIAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE limpiar IS
res number;
BEGIN
 Res := 1;
 If (:System.form_status = 'CHANGED' Or :System.form_status = 'NEW') Then
 Res := Preguntar ('La Forma Tiene Datos Sin Grabar. Desea Blanquear?');
 End If;
 If (Res = 1) Then
 Clear_Form (No_Validate);
 Inicio;
 End If;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SALIR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE salir IS
res number;
BEGIN
 Res := 0;
 If (:System.form_status = 'CHANGED') Then
 Res := Preguntar ('La Forma Tiene Datos Sin Grabar. Desea Almacenarlos Ahora?');
 End If;
 If (Res = 1) Then
 Grabar;
 End If;
 Exit_form(no_validate);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: INTERFAZ_CONTABLE_CCOS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE interfaz_contable_ccos (EMPP IN VARCHAR2, fechap IN date, CONSEC IN NUMBER, 
 c_clap in varchar2, desp in varchar2, cptep out number, usrp in varchar2, 
 cerr in out number, merr in out varchar2) IS
 
 huboerror exception ; 
 Depre_Acum NUMBER;
 Costo_actual NUMBER; 
 Aju_Depre NUMBER;
 Aju_Costoh NUMBER;
 SeqCpte number; 
 totdb number;
 totcr number; 
 CTA_OLD PLAN_cTA.C_cTA%TYPE;
 CTA_NEW PLAN_cTA.C_cTA%TYPE;
 rper varchar2(6); 
 rn_ide nits.n_ide%type; 
 reqx1 CPTE_DET.REQ1%TYPE;
 reqx2 CPTE_DET.REQ2%TYPE;
 reqx3 CPTE_DET.REQ3%TYPE;
 rc_cos ccost.C_COS%TYPE;
 nom_act activ_fi.nom%type; 
 rage activ_fi.c_agr%type;
 C_COS_OLD ccost.C_COS%TYPE;
 rdesp varchar2(1000); 
 CURSOR DATOS IS
 SELECT C_ACT, VALOR, CAMPO1 C_COS_Old, CAMPO2 C_COS_NEW 
 FROM OPERACIONES_ACTIVO
 WHERE C_EMP = EMPP
 AND PERIODO = rPER 
 AND NUM_OPERACION = CONSEC 
 ORDER BY 1; 
 
Begin
 CERR := 0; 
 MERR := 'OK'; 
 select to_char(fechap,'yyyymm') into rper from dual; 
 -- SE VA A REALIZAR EL TRASLADO DE CONTABLE DE LA CUENTA DEL COSTO HISTORICO Y DEPRECIACION DEL VIEJO AL NUEVO CENTRO DE COSTO 
 --- LO QUE ESTE EN LA TABLA
 
 -- BUSCO LA FUENTE DE LA DEPRECIACION

 --GENERAMOS EL COSNECUTIVO DEL COMPROBANTE CONTABLE
 CONSEC_CPTE_CTBLE( empp, rPER , c_clap, CPTEp, CERR, merr) ;
 IF CERR <> 0 THEN
 Raise HuboError;
 END IF;
 
 --- insertamos el encabezado del comprobante
 BEGIN
 INSERT INTO CPTE_ENC(C_EMP,PER,C_CLA,CPTE,CLCONS,FEC,DES,EST,
 RESP, USR, TOTDEB, TOTCRE, fec_elab )
 VALUES(EMPP, rPER , c_clap , CPTEp, CPTEp,
 FECHAp, desp ,'J', 'INTERFAZ', usrp , 0, 0, sysdate);
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 CERR := 4;
 Merr := 'Problemas al Insertar el encabezado del comprobante. '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 Raise HuboError;
 END;
 SeqCpte := 0;
 TotCr := 0;
 TotDB := 0;
 FOR A IN DATOS
 LOOP
 --- busco el proveedor del activo fijo
 begin
 select c_prov, nom , C_AGR 
 into rn_ide, nom_act , rage 
 from activ_fi
 where c_emp = empp
 and c_act = a.c_act;
 exception
 when no_Data_found then
 CERR := 5;
 Merr := 'El activo '||a.c_act||' no se encuentra';
 Raise HuboError;
 end; 
 rdesp := substr(desp||' '||a.c_act||' '||nom_act,1,200);
 Costo_actual := Act.Costo_Historico(EMPP, A.C_act );
 Costo_actual := nvl( Costo_actual,0); 
 
 Act.Valores_Activo(EMPP, A.C_act, Aju_Costoh, Depre_Acum, Aju_Depre);
 Depre_Acum := nvl( Depre_Acum,0);
 IF Costo_actual <> 0 THEN 
 --- SE BUSCA LA CUENTA CONTABLE DEL COSTO HISTORICO
 CTA_OLD := ACTF_TRAE_CTA(EMPP, rAGE , A.C_act, A.C_COS_old, :GLOBAL.FUE_CH, 'D');
 if cta_old is not null then -- se inserta en cpte_det con la cuenta vieja 
 SeqCpte := SeqCpte + 1;
 begin
 select decode(req1,'NIT',Rn_ide,NULL),
 decode(req2,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(req3,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(c_cos,'S', a.C_COS_old, 'N', NULL)
 into reqx1,reqx2,reqx3,rc_cos
 from plan_cta
 where c_emp = empp 
 and c_cta = CTA_OLD;
 Exception
 when no_data_found then
 CERR := 6;
 Merr := 'Problemas al consultar los requerimientos de la cuenta ' ||CTA_OLD;
 Raise HuboError;
 when others then
 CERR := 7;
 Merr :='Al Consultar PLAN_CTA ' ||CTA_OLD||' '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise HuboError;
 end;
 BEGIN 
 Insert Into Cpte_Det(c_emp, per, c_cla, cpte, seq, c_cta, 
 req1, req2, req3, req4, c_cos, 
 fec, db, cr, des, FEC_ELAB)
 Values(Empp, rPER, c_clap , cptep, SeqCpte,CTA_OLD, 
 reqx1, reqx2, reqx3,0, rc_cos, 
 FECHAp, 0, Costo_actual, rdesp, SYSDATE);
 exception 
 when others then
 cerr := 8;
 merr := 'Error. al insertar en (CPTE_DET) '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise huboerror; 
 END; 
 TotCr := TotCr + Costo_actual; 
 end if; 
 CTA_NEW := ACTF_TRAE_CTA(EMPP, rAGE, A.C_act, A.C_COS_new, :GLOBAL.FUE_CH,'D'); 
 if cta_new is not null then -- se inserta en cpte_det con la cuenta nueva
 SeqCpte := SeqCpte + 1;
 begin
 select decode(req1,'NIT',Rn_ide,NULL),
 decode(req2,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(req3,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(c_cos,'S', a.C_COS_new, 'N', NULL)
 into reqx1,reqx2,reqx3,rc_cos
 from plan_cta
 where c_emp = empp 
 and c_cta = CTA_new;
 Exception
 when no_data_found then
 CERR := 9;
 Merr := 'Problemas al consultar los requerimientos de la cuenta ' ||CTA_new;
 Raise HuboError;
 when others then
 CERR := 10;
 Merr :='Al Consultar PLAN_CTA ' ||CTA_new||' '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise HuboError;
 end;
 BEGIN 
 Insert Into Cpte_Det(c_emp, per, c_cla, cpte, seq, c_cta, 
 req1, req2, req3, req4, c_cos, 
 fec, db, cr, des, FEC_ELAB)
 Values(Empp, rPER, c_clap , cptep, SeqCpte,CTA_new, 
 reqx1, reqx2, reqx3,0, rc_cos, 
 FECHAp, Costo_actual, 0, Rdesp, SYSDATE);
 exception 
 when others then
 cerr := 11;
 merr := 'Error. al insertar en (CPTE_DET) '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise huboerror; 
 END; 
 Totdb := Totdb + Costo_actual; 
 end if;
 END IF;
 IF Depre_Acum <> 0 THEN 
 -- SE BUSCA LA CUENTA CONTABLE DE LA DEPRCIACION
 CTA_OLD := ACTF_TRAE_CTA(EMPP, rAGE, A.C_act, A.C_COS_old, :GLOBAL.FUE_dep,'C');
 if cta_old is not null then 
 -- se inserta en cpte_det con la cuenta vieja 
 SeqCpte := SeqCpte + 1;
 begin
 select decode(req1,'NIT',:global.nit_dep,NULL),
 decode(req2,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(req3,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(c_cos,'S', a.C_COS_old, 'N', NULL)
 into reqx1,reqx2,reqx3,rc_cos
 from plan_cta
 where c_emp = empp 
 and c_cta = CTA_OLD;
 Exception
 when no_data_found then
 CERR := 12;
 Merr := 'Problemas al consultar los requerimientos de la cuenta ' ||CTA_OLD;
 Raise HuboError;
 when others then
 CERR := 13;
 Merr :='Al Consultar PLAN_CTA ' ||CTA_OLD||' '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise HuboError;
 end;
 BEGIN 
 Insert Into Cpte_Det(c_emp, per, c_cla, cpte, seq, c_cta, 
 req1, req2, req3, req4, c_cos, 
 fec, db, cr, des, FEC_ELAB)
 Values(Empp, rPER, c_clap , cptep, SeqCpte,CTA_OLD, 
 reqx1, reqx2, reqx3,0, rc_cos, 
 FECHAp, Depre_Acum , 0, Rdesp, SYSDATE);
 exception 
 when others then
 cerr := 14;
 merr := 'Error. al insertar en (CPTE_DET) '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise huboerror; 
 END; 
 Totdb := Totdb + Depre_Acum ; 
 end if;
 CTA_new := ACTF_TRAE_CTA(EMPP, rAGE, A.C_act, A.C_COS_new, :GLOBAL.FUE_dep,'C');
 if cta_new is not null then 
 -- se inserta en cpte_det con la cuenta nuewva 
 SeqCpte := SeqCpte + 1;
 begin
 select decode(req1,'NIT',:global.nit_dep,NULL),
 decode(req2,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(req3,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(c_cos,'S', a.C_COS_new, 'N', NULL)
 into reqx1,reqx2,reqx3,rc_cos
 from plan_cta
 where c_emp = empp 
 and c_cta = CTA_new;
 Exception
 when no_data_found then
 CERR := 15;
 Merr := 'Problemas al consultar los requerimientos de la cuenta ' ||CTA_new;
 Raise HuboError;
 when others then
 CERR := 16;
 Merr :='Al Consultar PLAN_CTA ' ||CTA_new||' '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise HuboError;
 end;
 BEGIN 
 Insert Into Cpte_Det(c_emp, per, c_cla, cpte, seq, c_cta, 
 req1, req2, req3, req4, c_cos, 
 fec, db, cr, des, FEC_ELAB)
 Values(Empp, rPER, c_clap , cptep, SeqCpte,CTA_new, 
 reqx1, reqx2, reqx3,0, rc_cos, 
 FECHAp, 0, Depre_Acum , Rdesp, SYSDATE);
 exception 
 when others then
 cerr := 17;
 merr := 'Error. al insertar en (CPTE_DET) '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise huboerror; 
 END; 
 TotCR := TotCR + Depre_Acum ; 
 end if; 
 END IF; 
 END LOOP; 
 --
 -- Actualiza los totales del comprobante
 --
 commit;
 IF totdb <> totcr THEN
 cerr := 18;
 merr := 'Error. CPTE DESCUADRADO '||totdb||' '||totcr;
 raise huboerror; 
 END IF; 
 Update cpte_enc
 Set TotDeb = TotDb, 
 TotCre = TotCr
 Where c_emp = Empp 
 And per = rPER 
 And c_cla = c_clap 
 And cpte = cptep;
 
 if totdb <> 0 and totcr <> 0 then 
 --
 -- Asentamos el Comprobante
 --
 
 AsientoSINCOMMIT( Empp, rPER, c_clap, cptep, CERR, MERR);
 if cerr <> 0 then 
 raise huboerror; 
 end if;
 UPDATE OPERACIONES_ACTIVO
 SET C_CLA = C_CLAP ,
 CPTE = CPTEP
 WHERE C_EMP = EMPP
 AND PERIODO = rPER 
 AND NUM_OPERACION = CONSEC ; 
 end if; 
 
exception
 when HUBOERROR then
 merr := '[INTERFAZ_CONTABLE_CCOS]-'||CERR||':'||MERR;
 when others then
 cerr := sqlcode;
 merr := sqlerrm;
 merr := '[INTERFAZ_CONTABLE_CCOS]-'||CERR||':'||MERR;
 
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: IMPRIMIR_CTBLE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE IMPRIMIR_CTBLE IS
 reporte Varchar2(100);
 pl_id ParamList;
 Res number;
BEGIN
 reporte := 'Act4037';
 pl_id := Get_Parameter_List ('tmpdata'); 
 IF NOT Id_Null(pl_id) THEN 
 Destroy_Parameter_List( pl_id ); 
 END IF; 
 pl_id := Create_Parameter_List('tmpdata'); 
 Add_Parameter (pl_id, 'EMP', TEXT_PARAMETER, :GLOBAL.empresa);
 Add_Parameter (pl_id, 'NUM', TEXT_PARAMETER, :control.CSC); 
 Run_Product (REPORTS, reporte , ASYNCHRONOUS, RUNTIME, 
 FILESYSTEM, pl_id, NULL); 
 END;

ProgramUnit.Name: BUSCAR_UNO
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE BUSCAR_uno IS
 CURSOR DATOS IS 
 SELECT C_ACT, C_AGR, c_cos, area_trab, ubicacion, resp, custodio, codinteligente,
 nom , modelo, ESTADO, FECHA , c_fam, C_PROV
 FROM ACTIV_FI 
 WHERE c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and c_act = :control.c_act 
 order by 1; 
BEGIN
 GO_BLOCK('ACTIV_FI'); 
 for a in datos 
 LOOP
 GO_BLOCK('ACTIV_FI');
 CREATE_RECORD; 
 :activ_fi.c_act := a.c_Act;
 :activ_fi.c_cos := a.c_cos ;
 :activ_fi.area_trab := a.area_trab ;
 :activ_fi.ubicacion := a.ubicacion ;
 :activ_fi.resp := a.resp ;
 :activ_fi.codinteligente := a.codinteligente ;
 :activ_fi.nom := a.nom ;
 :activ_fi.modelo := a.modelo ;
 :activ_fi.c_fam := a.c_fam ;
 :activ_fi.c_AGR := a.c_AGR ;
 :activ_fi.modelo := a.modelo ; 
 :activ_fi.C_PROV := a.C_PROV ; 
 :ACTIV_FI.SEL := 'S'; 
 select sum(nvl(valor,0) )
 into :activ_fi.valor_va
 from OPERACIONES_ACTIVO
 where c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and c_act = :ACTIV_FI.C_ACT 
 and fecha <= :control.fecha 
 and ESTADO = 'A'
 and tipo = 'VA';
 
 select sum(nvl(valor,0) ) 
 into :activ_fi.valor_dv
 from OPERACIONES_ACTIVO
 where c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and c_act = :ACTIV_FI.C_ACT 
 and fecha <= :control.fecha 
 and ESTADO = 'A'
 and tipo = 'DV';
 
 :activ_fi.valor_va := nvl(:activ_fi.valor_VA,0);
 :activ_fi.valor_va := nvl(:activ_fi.valor_dv,0);
 
 :activ_fi.Costo_actual := Act.Costo_Historico(:Global.Empresa,:ACTIV_FI.C_act );
 :activ_fi.Costo_actual := nvl(:activ_fi.Costo_actual,0); 
 --
 -- Procedimiento que Devuelve los Valores Actuales del Activo como
 -- Ajuste el Costo Historico, Depreciacion Acumulada y Ajuste por
 -- Inflacion a la depreciacion Acumulada. Tiene en Cuenta la Disminucion
 -- de los Valores en el Caso de Algunas Desmejoras que esten incluidas en
 -- el Activo Fijo.
 --
 
 Act.Valores_Activo(:GLobal.Empresa, :ACTIV_FI.C_act, 
 :activ_fi.Aju_Costoh, :activ_fi.Depre_Acum, :activ_fi.Aju_Depre);
 
 :activ_fi.costo_real := nvl(:activ_fi.Costo_actual,0) + nvl(:activ_fi.Aju_CostoH ,0)
 - (nvl(:activ_fi.Depre_Acum,0) + nvl(:activ_fi.Aju_Depre ,0) ); 
 --procedimiento 
 datos_activos ;
 END LOOP;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: INTERFAZ_CONTABLE_FAM
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE INTERFAZ_CONTABLE_fam (EMPP IN VARCHAR2, fechap IN date, CONSEC IN NUMBER, 
 c_clap in varchar2, desp in varchar2, cptep out number, usrp in varchar2, 
 cerr in out number, merr in out varchar2) IS
 
 huboerror exception ; 
 Depre_Acum NUMBER;
 Costo_actual NUMBER; 
 Aju_Depre NUMBER;
 Aju_Costoh NUMBER;
 SeqCpte number; 
 totdb number;
 totcr number; 
 CTA_OLD PLAN_cTA.C_cTA%TYPE;
 CTA_NEW PLAN_cTA.C_cTA%TYPE;
 rper varchar2(6); 
 rn_ide nits.n_ide%type; 
 reqx1 CPTE_DET.REQ1%TYPE;
 reqx2 CPTE_DET.REQ2%TYPE;
 reqx3 CPTE_DET.REQ3%TYPE;
 rc_cosx CPTE_DET.C_COS%TYPE; 
 rc_cos_Act CPTE_DET.C_COS%TYPE;
 nom_act activ_fi.nom%type; 
 rage activ_fi.c_agr%type;
 rdesp varchar2(1000); 
 CURSOR DATOS IS
 SELECT C_ACT, VALOR, CAMPO11 fam_old, CAMPO12 fam_new 
 FROM OPERACIONES_ACTIVO
 WHERE C_EMP = EMPP
 AND PERIODO = rPER 
 AND NUM_OPERACION = CONSEC 
 ORDER BY 1; 
 
Begin
 
 
 CERR := 0; 
 MERR := 'OK'; 
 select to_char(fechap,'yyyymm') into rper from dual; 
 -- SE VA A REALIZAR EL TRASLADO DE CONTABLE DE LA CUENTA DEL COSTO HISTORICO Y DEPRECIACION DEL VIEJO AL NUEVO CENTRO DE COSTO 
 --- LO QUE ESTE EN LA TABLA
 
 -- BUSCO LA FUENTE DE LA DEPRECIACION
 
 --GENERAMOS EL COSNECUTIVO DEL COMPROBANTE CONTABLE
 CONSEC_CPTE_CTBLE( empp, rPER , c_clap, CPTEp, CERR, merr) ;
 IF CERR <> 0 THEN
 Raise HuboError;
 END IF;
 
 --- insertamos el encabezado del comprobante
 BEGIN
 INSERT INTO CPTE_ENC(C_EMP,PER,C_CLA,CPTE,CLCONS,FEC,DES,EST,
 RESP, USR, TOTDEB, TOTCRE, fec_elab )
 VALUES(EMPP, rPER , c_clap , CPTEp, CPTEp,
 FECHAp, desp ,'J', usrp, usrp , 0, 0, sysdate);
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 CERR := 1;
 Merr := 'Problemas al Insertar el encabezado del comprobante. '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 Raise HuboError;
 END;
 SeqCpte := 0;
 TotCr := 0;
 TotDB := 0;
 FOR A IN DATOS
 LOOP
 --- busco el proveedor del activo fijo
 begin
 select c_prov, nom , C_AGR, C_COS 
 into rn_ide, nom_act , rage , RC_COS_ACT
 from activ_fi
 where c_emp = empp
 and c_act = a.c_act;
 exception
 when no_Data_found then
 CERR := 2;
 Merr := 'El activo '||a.c_act||' no se encuentra';
 Raise HuboError;
 end; 
 rdesp := substr(desp||' '||a.c_act||' '||nom_act,1,200);
 Costo_actual := Act.Costo_Historico(EMPP, A.C_act );
 Costo_actual := nvl( Costo_actual,0); 
 Act.Valores_Activo(EMPP, A.C_act, Aju_Costoh, Depre_Acum, Aju_Depre);
 Depre_Acum := nvl( Depre_Acum,0);
 IF Costo_actual <> 0 THEN 
 --- SE BUSCA LA CUENTA CONTABLE DEL COSTO HISTORICO
 CTA_OLD := ACTF_TRAE_CTA_FAM(EMPP, rAGE , A.fam_OLD, RC_COS_ACT, :GLOBAL.FUE_CH, 'D');
 if cta_old is not null then -- se inserta en cpte_det con la cuenta vieja 
 SeqCpte := SeqCpte + 1;
 begin
 select decode(req1,'NIT',Rn_ide,NULL),
 decode(req2,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(req3,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(c_cos,'S', RC_COS_ACT, 'N', NULL)
 into reqx1,reqx2,reqx3, rc_cosx
 from plan_cta
 where c_emp = empp 
 and c_cta = CTA_OLD;
 Exception
 when no_data_found then
 CERR := 3;
 Merr := 'Problemas al consultar los requerimientos de la cuenta ' ||CTA_OLD;
 Raise HuboError;
 when others then
 CERR := 4;
 Merr :='Al Consultar PLAN_CTA ' ||CTA_OLD||' '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise HuboError;
 end;
 BEGIN 
 Insert Into Cpte_Det(c_emp, per, c_cla, cpte, seq, c_cta, 
 req1, req2, req3, req4, c_cos, 
 fec, db, cr, des, FEC_ELAB)
 Values(Empp, rPER, c_clap , cptep, SeqCpte,CTA_OLD, 
 reqx1, reqx2, reqx3,0, rc_cosx, 
 FECHAp, 0, Costo_actual, rdesp, SYSDATE);
 exception 
 when others then
 cerr := 5;
 merr := 'Error. al insertar en (CPTE_DET) '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise huboerror; 
 END; 
 TotCr := TotCr + Costo_actual; 
 ELSE
 CERR := 6;
 Merr := 'Problemas al consultar los requerimientos de la cuenta ' ||CTA_OLD;
 Raise HuboError;
 end if; 
 CTA_NEW := ACTF_TRAE_CTA_FAM(EMPP, rAGE, A.fam_new , RC_COS_ACT, :GLOBAL.FUE_CH, 'D');
 IF cta_new is not null then -- se inserta en cpte_det con la cuenta nueva
 SeqCpte := SeqCpte + 1;
 begin
 select decode(req1,'NIT',Rn_ide,NULL),
 decode(req2,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(req3,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(c_cos,'S', RC_COS_ACT, 'N', NULL)
 into reqx1,reqx2,reqx3,rc_cosx
 from plan_cta
 where c_emp = empp 
 and c_cta = CTA_new;
 Exception
 when no_data_found then
 CERR := 7;
 Merr := 'Problemas al consultar los requerimientos de la cuenta ' ||CTA_new;
 Raise HuboError;
 when others then
 CERR := 8;
 Merr :='Al Consultar PLAN_CTA ' ||CTA_new||' '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise HuboError;
 end;
 BEGIN 
 Insert Into Cpte_Det(c_emp, per, c_cla, cpte, seq, c_cta, 
 req1, req2, req3, req4, c_cos, 
 fec, db, cr, des, FEC_ELAB)
 Values(Empp, rPER, c_clap , cptep, SeqCpte,CTA_new, 
 reqx1, reqx2, reqx3,0, rc_cosx, 
 FECHAp, Costo_actual, 0, Rdesp, SYSDATE);
 exception 
 when others then
 cerr := 9;
 merr := 'Error. al insertar en (CPTE_DET) '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise huboerror; 
 END; 
 Totdb := Totdb + Costo_actual; 
 end if;
 END IF;
 IF Depre_Acum <> 0 THEN 
 -- SE BUSCA LA CUENTA CONTABLE DE LA DEPRCIACION
 CTA_OLD := ACTF_TRAE_CTA_FAM(EMPP, rAGE, A.fam_OLD, RC_COS_ACT, :GLOBAL.FUE_dep,'C');
 if cta_old is not null then 
 -- se inserta en cpte_det con la cuenta vieja 
 SeqCpte := SeqCpte + 1;
 begin
 select decode(req1,'NIT',:global.nit_dep,NULL),
 decode(req2,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(req3,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(c_cos,'S', RC_COS_ACT, 'N', NULL)
 into reqx1,reqx2,reqx3,rc_cosx
 from plan_cta
 where c_emp = empp 
 and c_cta = CTA_OLD;
 Exception
 when no_data_found then
 CERR := 10;
 Merr := 'Problemas al consultar los requerimientos de la cuenta ' ||CTA_OLD;
 Raise HuboError;
 when others then
 CERR := 11;
 Merr :='Al Consultar PLAN_CTA ' ||CTA_OLD||' '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise HuboError;
 end;
 BEGIN 
 Insert Into Cpte_Det(c_emp, per, c_cla, cpte, seq, c_cta, 
 req1, req2, req3, req4, c_cos, 
 fec, db, cr, des, FEC_ELAB)
 Values(Empp, rPER, c_clap , cptep, SeqCpte,CTA_OLD, 
 reqx1, reqx2, reqx3,0, rc_cosx , 
 FECHAp, Depre_Acum , 0, Rdesp, SYSDATE);
 exception 
 when others then
 cerr := 12;
 merr := 'Error. al insertar en (CPTE_DET) '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise huboerror; 
 END; 
 Totdb := Totdb + Depre_Acum ; 
 end if;
 CTA_new := ACTF_TRAE_CTA_FAM(EMPP, rAGE, A.fam_new, RC_COS_ACT, :GLOBAL.FUE_dep,'C');
 if cta_new is not null then 
 -- se inserta en cpte_det con la cuenta nuewva 
 SeqCpte := SeqCpte + 1;
 begin
 select decode(req1,'NIT',:global.nit_dep,NULL),
 decode(req2,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(req3,NULL,NULL, a.C_ACT ),
 decode(c_cos,'S', RC_COS_ACT, 'N', NULL)
 into reqx1,reqx2,reqx3,rc_cosx
 from plan_cta
 where c_emp = empp 
 and c_cta = CTA_new;
 Exception
 when no_data_found then
 CERR := 13;
 Merr := 'Problemas al consultar los requerimientos de la cuenta ' ||CTA_new;
 Raise HuboError;
 when others then
 CERR := 14;
 Merr :='Al Consultar PLAN_CTA ' ||CTA_new||' '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise HuboError;
 end;
 BEGIN 
 Insert Into Cpte_Det(c_emp, per, c_cla, cpte, seq, c_cta, 
 req1, req2, req3, req4, c_cos, 
 fec, db, cr, des, FEC_ELAB)
 Values(Empp, rPER, c_clap , cptep, SeqCpte,CTA_new, 
 reqx1, reqx2, reqx3,0, rc_cosx, 
 FECHAp, 0, Depre_Acum , Rdesp, SYSDATE);
 exception 
 when others then
 cerr := 15;
 merr := 'Error. al insertar en (CPTE_DET) '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise huboerror; 
 END; 
 TotCR := TotCR + Depre_Acum ; 
 end if; 
 END IF; 
 END LOOP; 
 --
 -- Actualiza los totales del comprobante
 --
 IF totdb <> totcr THEN
 cerr := 18;
 merr := 'Error. CPTE DESCUADRADO '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 raise huboerror; 
 END IF; 
 Update cpte_enc
 Set TotDeb = TotDb, 
 TotCre = TotCr
 Where c_emp = Empp 
 And per = rPER 
 And c_cla = c_clap 
 And cpte = cptep;
 
 if totdb <> 0 and totcr <> 0 then 
 --
 -- Asentamos el Comprobante
 --
 AsientoSINCOMMIT( Empp, rPER, c_clap, cptep, CERR, MERR);
 if cerr <> 0 then 
 raise huboerror; 
 end if;
 UPDATE OPERACIONES_ACTIVO
 SET C_CLA = C_CLAP ,
 CPTE = CPTEP
 WHERE C_EMP = EMPP
 AND PERIODO = rPER 
 AND NUM_OPERACION = CONSEC ; 
 end if; 
 
exception
 when HUBOERROR then
 merr := '[INTERFAZ_CONTABLE_FAM]-'||CERR||':'||MERR;
 when others then
 cerr := sqlcode;
 merr := sqlerrm;
 merr := '[INTERFAZ_CONTABLE_FAM]-'||CERR||':'||MERR;
 
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: BUSCAR_CUENTAS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE buscar_cuentas IS
BEGIN
 :activ_fi.CTA_traslado_o := ACTF_TRAE_CTA_FAM(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA, :activ_fi.C_AGR, :activ_fi.c_fam,
 :activ_fi.c_Cos, :control.tipo_t, 'D' );
 if :DESTINO.c_fam is not null then 
 IF :DESTINO.c_cos is not null then 
 :activ_fi.CTA_traslado_d := ACTF_TRAE_CTA_FAM(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA, :activ_fi.C_AGR, :DESTINO.c_fam, 
 :DESTINO.c_Cos, :control.tipo_t, 'D' );
 else
 :activ_fi.CTA_traslado_d := ACTF_TRAE_CTA_FAM(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA, :activ_fi.C_AGR, :DESTINO.c_fam, 
 :activ_fi.c_Cos, :control.tipo_t, 'D' );
 end if; 
 else
 if :DESTINO.c_cos is not null then 
 :activ_fi.CTA_traslado_d := ACTF_TRAE_CTA_FAM(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA, :activ_fi.C_AGR, :activ_fi.c_fam, 
 :DESTINO.c_Cos, :control.tipo_t, 'D' );
 else
 :activ_fi.CTA_traslado_d := :activ_fi.CTA_traslado_o;
 end if; 
 end if; 
 SYNCHRONIZE; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: DATOS_ACTIVOS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE datos_activos IS
BEGIN
 
 BEGIN
 SELECT NOM 
 INTO :ACTIV_FI.NOM_FAM
 FROM FAMIL_AF
 WHERE C_FAM = :ACTIV_FI.C_FAM 
 AND C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA; 
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN NULL;
 END;

 BEGIN
 SELECT Nom 
 INTO :ACTIV_FI.NOM_PROV 
 FROM NITS
 WHERE N_IDE = :activ_fi.c_prov 
 AND C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA;
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN NULL;
 END;

 BEGIN
 SELECT DES_MAR 
 INTO :ACTIV_FI.NOM_MARCA 
 FROM MARCAS
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA 
 AND COD_MAR = :ACTIV_FI.MARCA;
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN NULL;
 END;

 begin 
 select nom 
 into :activ_fi.nom_age
 from agencia
 where c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and c_age = :activ_fi.c_agr;
 exception 
 when no_data_found then 
 :activ_fi.nom_age := null;
 end;

 begin 
 select nom 
 into :activ_fi.nom_cos 
 from ccost
 where c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and c_cos = :activ_fi.c_cos;
 exception 
 when no_data_found then 
 :activ_fi.nom_cos:=null;
 end;

 begin 
 select nom 
 into :activ_fi.nom_resp 
 from nits
 where c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and n_ide = :activ_fi.resp;
 exception 
 when no_data_found then 
 :activ_fi.nom_resp := null;
 end;

 begin 
 select nom 
 into :activ_fi.NOM_AREA 
 from area_trab
 where c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and c_are = :activ_fi.area_trab;
 exception 
 when no_data_found then 
 :activ_fi.NOM_AREA := NULL;
 end; 
 BEGIN
 SELECT DES_UBI 
 INTO :ACTIV_FI.NOM_UBICACION
 FROM UBICACION_ACT
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND COD_UBI = :ACTIV_FI.UBICACION;
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN 
 :ACTIV_FI.NOM_UBICACION := NULL;
 END;

 BEGIN
 SELECT DES 
 INTO :ACTIV_FI.DESC_TIAC
 FROM TIPO_ACTFI
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_TIAC = :ACTIV_FI.C_TIAC;
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN 
 :ACTIV_FI.DESC_TIAC := NULL;
 END;

 BEGIN
 SELECT DES 
 INTO :ACTIV_FI.DES_SUBTIAC
 FROM SUBTIPO_ACTFI
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_TIAC = :ACTIV_FI.C_TIAC
 AND C_SUBTI = :ACTIV_FI.C_SUBTIAC;
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN 
 :ACTIV_FI.DES_SUBTIAC := NULL;
 END;

 BEGIN
 SELECT NVL(NOM_LARGO,NOM) NOM 
 INTO :ACTIV_FI.NOM_ART
 FROM ARTICULO
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND COD = :ACTIV_FI.COD_ART;
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN 
 :ACTIV_FI.NOM_ART := NULL;
 END;

 BEGIN
 SELECT NOM 
 INTO :ACTIV_FI.NOM_BOD
 FROM BODEGA
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_BOD = :ACTIV_FI.BOD;
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN 
 :ACTIV_FI.NOM_BOD := NULL;
 END;

 BEGIN
 SELECT DES 
 INTO :ACTIV_FI.NOM_FUE
 FROM FUE_NOM
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND FUE = :ACTIV_FI.FUE;
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN 
 :ACTIV_FI.NOM_FUE := NULL;
 END;
 synchronize; 
end;

ProgramUnit.Name: CREA_ACTIVO_NUEVO
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE CREA_ACTIVO_NUEVO ( EMPP IN VARCHAR2, C_ACT_OLD IN VARCHAR2, C_FAM_NEW IN VARCHAR2, C_ACT_NEW OUT VARCHAR2, 
 usrp in varchar2, cerr in out number, merr in out varchar2) IS
 
 huboerror exception ; 
 RCSC numbeR; 
 BEGIN
 
 If (:Global.Numera = 'A') then
 -- Si la numeración es automática
 C_ACT_NEW := Actf_numera(EMPP,C_FAM_NEW, CERR,MERR);
 if cerr <> 0 then 
 raise HUBOERROR; 
 end if;
 end if;
 Begin 
 select nvl(max(csc),0) + 1
 into Rcsc
 from Activ_fi
 where c_emp = :global.empresa;
 Exception
 When others then
 Rcsc := 1;
 End; 
 Begin 
 INSERT INTO ACTIV_FI(C_EMP,C_ACT,C_FAM,CODINTELIGENTE,OBSERVACION, CSC,
 FECHA,NOM,C_PROV,COSTO,MARCA,REF,ESTADO,C_AGR,AREA_TRAB,RESP, 
 DEPRECIA,UBICACION,AVALUO,RESIDUAL,TURNOS_AD,MET_A,EST_DEP,REAJUSTE,AMORTIZA,
 MEJORA,COD_ART,EMP_GAR,N_IDE,PER_EST_DEP,DESDE_GARAN,HASTA_GARAN,C_COS,PER_DARBAJA,
 CANT,CSC_MEJORA,BOD,NFUENTE,ANO_RM,RM,ANO_OC,OC,PER,COD_BAR,CUSTODIO,MONEDA,
 COSTO_OTRA_MONEDA,TRM,PRECIO_FOB,C_CTA_SI,TIP,MODELO, 
 PER_FUE,FUE,N_FUE,C_TIAC,C_SUBTIAC,EST_FUNC,FORMA_ADQUISICION,OTRO_DOCUMENTO,C_ACT_REF,
 FECHA_COMPRA,COLOR,USR,FEC_PROC,FEC_ELAB) 
 SELECT C_EMP,C_ACT_NEW,C_FAM_NEW,CODINTELIGENTE, 
 substr(OBSERVACION||' Activo Reemplazo: '||C_ACT_OLD ,1,1000), rCSC,
 FECHA,NOM,C_PROV,COSTO,MARCA,REF,ESTADO,C_AGR,AREA_TRAB,RESP, 
 DEPRECIA,UBICACION,AVALUO,RESIDUAL,TURNOS_AD,MET_A,EST_DEP,REAJUSTE,AMORTIZA,
 MEJORA,COD_ART,EMP_GAR,N_IDE,PER_EST_DEP,DESDE_GARAN,HASTA_GARAN,C_COS,PER_DARBAJA,
 CANT,CSC_MEJORA,BOD,NFUENTE,ANO_RM,RM,ANO_OC,OC,PER,COD_BAR,CUSTODIO,MONEDA,
 COSTO_OTRA_MONEDA,TRM,PRECIO_FOB, C_CTA_SI,TIP,MODELO, 
 PER_FUE,FUE,N_FUE,C_TIAC,C_SUBTIAC,EST_FUNC,FORMA_ADQUISICION,OTRO_DOCUMENTO,C_ACT_REF,
 FECHA_COMPRA,COLOR,USRP,SYSDATE,SYSDATE 
 FROM ACTIV_FI
 WHERE C_eMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_aCT = C_ACT_OLD ;
 Exception
 When others then
 CERR := 2;
 MERR := 'Error Insertando en ACTIV_FI '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 RAISE HUBOERROR;
 End; 
 
 BEGIN 
 INSERT INTO ACTF_CUSTODIOS(C_EMP,C_ACT,N_IDE,EST,FECHA_INI,FECHA_FIN,USR,FEC_PROC,FEC_ELAB)
 SELECT C_EMP,C_ACT_NEW,N_IDE,EST,FECHA_INI,FECHA_FIN,USRP,SYSDATE,SYSDATE 
 FROM ACTF_CUSTODIOS
 WHERE C_eMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_aCT = C_ACT_OLD ;
 Exception
 When others then
 CERR := 3;
 MERR := 'Error Insertando en ACTF_CUSTODIOS '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 RAISE HUBOERROR;
 End; 
 
 BEGIN 
 INSERT INTO ACT_ASEG(C_EMP,C_ACT,N_POL,VALOR,C_RIE,EST,USR,FEC_PROC,FEC_ELAB)
 SELECT C_EMP,C_ACT_NEW,N_POL,VALOR,C_RIE,EST,USRP,SYSDATE,SYSDATE 
 FROM ACT_ASEG
 WHERE C_eMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_aCT = C_ACT_OLD ; 
 Exception
 When others then
 CERR := 4;
 MERR := 'Error Insertando en ACT_ASEG '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 RAISE HUBOERROR;
 End; 
 BEGIN 
 INSERT INTO DETALLES(C_EMP,C_ACT,REF,DETALLE,OBSER,EST,TIP,MODELO,SERIE,USR,FEC_PROC,FEC_ELAB)
 SELECT C_EMP,C_ACT_NEW,REF,DETALLE,OBSER,EST,TIP,MODELO,SERIE,USRP,SYSDATE,SYSDATE 
 FROM DETALLES
 WHERE C_eMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_aCT = C_ACT_OLD ; 
 Exception
 When others then
 CERR :=5;
 MERR := 'Error Insertando en DETALLES '||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 RAISE HUBOERROR;
 End; 
 
 BEGIN
 INSERT INTO HISTORICO_ACT(C_EMP,OPERACION,C_ACT,FECHA,CCOS,C_AGR,RESP,CUSTODIO,AREA,
 UBICACION,USR,FEC_PROC)
 select C_EMP,'CREACION',C_ACT_NEW, FECHA, C_COS,C_AGR,RESP,CUSTODIO, AREA_TRAB,
 UBICACION, USRP,sysdate 
 from ACTIV_FI
 WHERE C_eMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_aCT = C_ACT_OLD ;
 Exception
 When others then
 CERR :=6;
 MERR := 'Error Insertando en HISTORICO_ACT'||SQLCODE||' '||SQLERRM;
 RAISE HUBOERROR;
 END;
 
 
 UPDATE ACTIV_FI
 SET EST_DEP = 'I',
 ESTADO = 'I' 
 WHERE C_eMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND C_aCT = C_ACT_OLD ;




 exception
 when HUBOERROR then
 merr := '[CREA_ACTIVO_NUEVO]-'||CERR||':'||MERR;
 when others then
 cerr := sqlcode;
 merr := sqlerrm;
 merr := '[CREA_ACTIVO_NUEVO]-'||CERR||':'||MERR; 
END;

RecordGroup.Name: AREAS_TRAB
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select distinct c.C_ARE, c.NOM
from area_Trab c, activ_fi a 
where c.c_emp=:global.empresa 
 and c.c_emp = a.c_emp
 and c.c_are = a.area_trab
 and a.c_cos like nvl(:ORIGEN.c_cos,'%') 
 and a.ubicacion like nvl(:ORIGEN.ubicacion,'%') 
 and a.resp like nvl(:ORIGEN.resp,'%') 
 and a.c_fam like nvl(:ORIGEN.c_fam,'%') 
 and ((:ORIGEN.custodio is not null and
 c_act in (select a.c_act from actf_custodios a
 where a.c_emp = :global.empresa
 and a.n_ide = :ORIGEN.custodio 
 and a.est = 'A' ) ) or
 :ORIGEN.custodio is null ) 
order by 1

RecordGroup.Name: CCOSTO
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select distinct c.c_cos, c.nom
from ccost c, activ_fi a 
where c.c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and c.tip_cc='R'
 and c.cla_cc ='D' 
 and c.c_emp = a.c_emp
 and c.c_cos = a.c_Cos 
 and a.area_trab like nvl(:ORIGEN.area_trab,'%') 
 and a.ubicacion like nvl(:ORIGEN.ubicacion,'%') 
 and a.resp like nvl(:ORIGEN.resp,'%') 
 and a.c_fam like nvl(:ORIGEN.c_fam,'%') 
 and ((:ORIGEN.custodio is not null and
 c_act in (select a.c_act from actf_custodios a
 where a.c_emp = :global.empresa
 and a.n_ide = :ORIGEN.custodio 
 and a.est = 'A' ) ) or
 :ORIGEN.custodio is null ) 
order by 1

RecordGroup.Name: CUSTODIOS
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select distinct c.n_ide, c.nombre,c.nit_emp, 
substr(trae_nombre(c.c_emp,c.nit_emp) ,1,60) nom_empresa
from custodios_act c, actf_custodios a
where c.c_emp = :global.empresa 
and a.c_emp = c.c_emp
and a.n_ide = c.n_ide 
order by 2

RecordGroup.Name: FAMILIA
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select distinct c.c_fam, c.nom
from famil_af c, activ_fi a 
where c.c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and c.CLA_FAM ='D' 
and c.c_emp = a.c_emp
and c.c_fam = a.c_fam 
 and a.c_cos like nvl(:origen.c_cos,'%') 
 and a.area_trab like nvl(:origen.area_trab,'%') 
 and a.ubicacion like nvl(:origen.ubicacion,'%') 
 and a.resp like nvl(:origen.resp,'%') 
 and ((:origen.custodio is not null and
 c_act in (select a.c_act from actf_custodios a
 where a.c_emp = :global.empresa
 and a.n_ide = :origen.custodio 
 and a.est = 'A' ) ) or
 :origen.custodio is null ) 
order by 1

RecordGroup.Name: EMPLEADOS
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select distinct c.n_ide, 
 substr(trae_nombre(c.c_emp,c.n_ide),1,60) nom 
from empleado c, activ_fi a 
where c.c_emp = :global.empresa 
and c.c_emp = a.c_emp
and c.n_ide = a.resp
 and a.c_cos like nvl(:origen.c_cos,'%') 
 and a.area_trab like nvl(:origen.area_trab,'%') 
 and a.ubicacion like nvl(:origen.ubicacion,'%') 
 and a.c_fam like nvl(:origen.c_fam,'%') 
 and ((:origen.custodio is not null and
 c_act in (select a.c_act from actf_custodios a
 where a.c_emp = :global.empresa
 and a.n_ide = :origen.custodio 
 and a.est = 'A' ) ) or
 :origen.custodio is null ) 
order by 2

RecordGroup.Name: UBICACION
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT distinct c.COD_UBI, c.DES_UBI
FROM UBICACION_ACT c, activ_fi a 
where c.c_emp = :global.empresa 
and c.c_emp = a.c_emp 
and c.cod_ubi = a.ubicacion
and c.clase = 'D'
 and a.c_cos like nvl(:origen.c_cos,'%') 
 and a.area_trab like nvl(:ORIGEN.area_trab,'%') 
 and a.resp like nvl(:ORIGEN.resp,'%') 
 and a.c_fam like nvl(:ORIGEN.c_fam,'%') 
 and ((:ORIGEN.custodio is not null and
 c_act in (select a.c_act from actf_custodios a
 where a.c_emp = :global.empresa
 and a.n_ide = :ORIGEN.custodio 
 and a.est = 'A' ) ) or
 :ORIGEN.custodio is null ) 
order by 1

RecordGroup.Name: CCOSTO_NEW
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select c_cos, nom
from ccost
where c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and activo = 'S' 
 and tip_cc ='R'
 and cla_cc ='D'
 and (:origen.c_cos is null or 
 c_cos <> :origen.c_Cos) 
order by 1

RecordGroup.Name: AREAS_TRAB_NEW
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select C_ARE, NOM
from area_Trab
where c_emp=:global.empresa
and est = 'A' 
and (:origen.area_trab is null
 or c_are <> :origen.area_trab ) 
order by 1

RecordGroup.Name: UBICACION_NEW
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT C.COD_UBI, C.DES_UBI
FROM UBICACION_ACT C
where C.c_emp = :global.empresa 
AND C.EST ='A' 
AND C.CLASE = 'D'
and (:origen.ubicacion is null 
 or C.cod_ubi <> :origen.ubicacion ) 
order by 1

RecordGroup.Name: EMPLEADOS_NEW
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select distinct c.n_ide, 
 substr(trae_nombre(c.c_emp,c.n_ide),1,60) nom 
from empleado c 
where c.c_emp = :global.empresa
and c.est = 'A'
and (:origen.resp is null 
 or c.n_ide <> :origen.resp) 
order by 2

RecordGroup.Name: FAMILIA_NEW
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select distinct c.c_fam, c.nom
from famil_af c 
where c.c_emp = :global.empresa 
 and c.CLA_FAM ='D' 
and (:origen.c_fam is null 
 or c.c_fam <> :origen.c_fam) 
order by 1

RecordGroup.Name: CUSTODIOS_NEW
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select n_ide, nombre,nit_emp, 
substr(trae_nombre(c_emp, nit_emp) ,1,60) nom_empresa
from custodios_act
where c_emp = :global.empresa
 and est = 'A'
 and (:origen.custodio is null or
 n_ide <> :origen.custodio ) 
order by 2

RecordGroup.Name: PLANTILLAS
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select p.c_plant, p.nom, p.c_cla 
from fue_plant f, plantilla_enc p 
where f.c_emp = :global.empresa and
 f.fue = :control.tipo_t and 
 p.c_emp = f.c_emp and
 p.c_plant = f.c_plant
order by p.nom

RecordGroup.Name: CLASES
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select c_cla, des
from clase_cpte
where c_emp = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
ORDER BY 1

RecordGroup.Name: ACTIVOS_CI
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select codinteligente, c_Act, nom
from activ_fi
where c_emp = :global.empresa
AND ESTADO IN ('A','R')
order by 1

RecordGroup.Name: ACTIVOS
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select c_Act, codinteligente, nom
from activ_fi
where c_emp = :global.empresa
 and estado ='A' 
order by 1

Trigger.Name: INIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
Declare
 Empresa Parametros.Emp%Type;
 LogoPath Varchar2 (200); 
Begin
 --
 -- Maximiza la ventana inicial
 --
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL:=20;
 Set_Window_Property ('WINDOW0', Window_State, Maximize);
 
 --
 -- Selecciona el nombre de la empresa
 --
 --:GLOBAL.empresa := '01' ;
 --:GLOBAL.USUARIO_SP6 := 'ADMIN' ;
 :TOOLBAR.c_emp := :GLOBAL.empresa;
 Begin
 Select Emp, logo Into Empresa, :toolbar.nombre_logo
 From Parametros
 Where C_Emp = :TOOLBAR.c_emp;
 Exception
 When no_data_found Then
 --
 -- Si la empresa no está definida se sale de la forma
 --
 MessageBox ('Empresa '||:TOOLBAR.c_emp||' no está definida.');
 Exit_Form (No_Validate); 
 End;
 --
 -- Despliega el nombre de la empresa en una o dos líneas
 -- dependiendo de la longitud del nombre
 --
 :Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1 := Empresa;
 :Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2 := Empresa;
 If (NVL(Length (:Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1), 0) > 30) Then
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2', Displayed, Property_True);
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1', Displayed, Property_False);
 Else
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2', Displayed, property_False);
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1', Displayed, property_True);
 End If;
 --
 -- Despliega el logo de la empresa
 --
 execute_trigger('lee_imagenes');

 --
 -- Llama al procedimiento de inicio particular de cada forma
 --
 Default_Value ('***', 'global.audsid'); 
 Begin
 Select machine Into Empresa
 From v$usr_sess
 Where audsid = :Global.audsid;
 Exception
 When others Then
 -- Exit_Form (No_Validate); 
 NULL;
 End;
End;
